accordion.name: Accordion
accordion.description: While remaining backward compatible, the recommended markup has been updated to implement the [WAI-ARIA 1.1 Accordion design pattern](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-practices-1.1/#accordion) to better support accessibility for keyboard and screen reader users.

actionbar.name: Action Bar
actionbar.description: Floating action bar that appears in selection mode.

actionmenu.name: Action Menu
actionmenu.description: Simply an action button with a Popover. Note that the `is-selected` class should be applied to the button when the menu is open. Also note the accessibility roles are different for an action menu vs a normal menu.

assetlist.name: Asset List
assetlist.description: A selectable list of Assets, often used inside of Miller Columns.

button-cta.name: Button - CTA
button-cta.description: The call to action button communicates strong emphasis and is reserved for encouraging critical actions.

button-over-background.name: Button - Over Background
button-over-background.description: When a button needs to be placed on top of a colored background or a visual, use the over background button. In order to implement this button, you must set the CSS color property of a parent element to the same value as the background the button is placed against.

button-primary.name: Button - Primary
button-primary.description: The primary button is used for medium emphasis.

button-secondary.name: Button - Secondary
button-secondary.description: The secondary button is for low emphasis.

button-warning.name: Button - Warning
button-warning.description: The negative button is for high emphasis of negative or destructive actions.

card-asset.name: Card - Asset preview
card-asset.description: A standard cards with a full-sized asset preview.

card-gallery.name: Card - Gallery
card-gallery.description: A gallery card for an image.

checkbox.name: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkboxes allow users to select multiple items from a list of individual items, or mark one individual item as selected.

datepicker.name: Date Picker
datepicker.description: A date picker uses the input group component to display a field with a button next to it

decoratedtextfield.name: Text Field - Decorated
decoratedtextfield.description: A Spectrum text field with an additional icon. The icon must be the Small size (18px) in order for it to be positioned correctly.

dial.name: Dial
dial.description: A dial for turning it up to 11.

dialog.name: Dialog
dialog.description: In order to avoid blurry Dialogs, wrap them in `<div class="spectrum-Dialog-wrapper">` and apply `.is-open` to both the Wrapper and the Dialog at the same time. See [this example](dialogAlert.html) for a working demonstration.

dropindicator.name: Drop Indicator
dropindicator.description: A Drop Indicator is used to show the insertion position into a list or table.

dropzone.name: Dropzone
dropzone.description: A Drop Zone is an area on the screen into a which an object can be dragged and dropped to accomplish a task. For example, a Drop Zone might be used in an upload workflow to enable the user to simply drop a file from their operating system into the Drop Zone, which is a more efficient and intuitive action, rather than utilize the standard "Choose File" dialog.

fieldgroup.name: Field Group
fieldgroup.description: A group of fields, usually Radios or Checkboxes.

fieldlabel.name: Field Label
fieldlabel.description: Field label for use with form inputs.

form.name: Form
form.description: Form provides stucture and spacing for your form fields.

logicbutton.name: Logic Button
logicbutton.description: A button that toggles between and/or when clicked.

meter.name: Meter
meter.description: Meter is implemented using the BarLoader component.

page.name: Page
page.description:
The outer page container. A parent tag should only have the `.spectrum` class if using a standalone CSS file.
If using multistops, a parent tag should have both the `.spectrum` class and the corresponding colorstop variant class, i.e. `.spectrum--light`.
Finally, if scaling to large with the diff strategy, a parent tag should have the `.spectrum--large` class.

quickaction.name: Quick Actions
quickaction.description: Note that the `.spectrum-QuickActions-overlay` class should be placed on the container where the Quick Actions are displayed, and the `.spectrum-QuickActions--textOnly` class should be applied when the buttons have text only.

searchwithin.name: Search Within
searchwithin.description: Override the width of the component where necessary.

stepper.name: Stepper
stepper.description: Note that you must manually apply the `.is-focused` class, and that the `.is-focused` styles below don't look correct unless your cursor is actually in the stepper input field.

typography.name: Typography
typography.description: English typography examples. See the [typography example page](typography.html) for Japanese, Han, and Arabic examples.
